subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who returned to the lineup Wednesday night in the Nets’ 111-107 defeat to the Hornets, has been playing with cracked ribs. But the injury might not stop him from being traded.
snippet: Jason Kidd, who returned to the lineup Wednesday night in the Nets’ 111-107 defeat to the Hornets, has been playing with cracked ribs. But the injury might not stop him from being traded.
